note.p: Death: Felpham Manor House, near Bognor, Sussex (31 August 1819)
Burial: Felpham churchyard, near Bognor, Sussex
Education: Manchester; BA (1768) MA (1771) BD (1777) DD (1781) Christ Church College, Oxford
Career: Sub-preceptor to George III's two eldest sons (1771); Preacher at Lincoln's Inn (1779-1783); Canon of Christ Church, Oxford (1779)
